data.name: Night Elf
data.description:
The Ancients - Night Elf [Q]
Units:
+1.5 HP/sec regeneration

Buildings:
+0.5 HP/sec regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Magic:
Rejuvenation (Heals 125 HP over 5s)
Entangling Roots (Deals 25 dmg/sec for 4s)
Lesser Starfall (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: Dedicated and specialized units, trained to fulfil their role to the max. Balanced and strong race without apparent weaknesses. Its full potential is impresive but it rises slowly and can be hard to reach.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Paralysis Aura
auras.description:
-20% your unit move speed
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: True Aim Aura
auras.description:
+20% ranged unit and structure damage
(2500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Thorns Aura
auras.description:
35 damage return shield
(units and buildings)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Ancient Guardian [Q]
bonuses.description:
Cenarius replaces Tiny

Special Unit (Ranged)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Mass Entangle (Disable Spell)
18-30 second stun
(500-800 area of effect)
(60 second cooldown)

Force of Nature (Summoning Spell)
summons up to 2-6 Treants
(45 second cooldown)

Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
12-30% damage bonus

Ancient Sprout (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Ancients
(100 second cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Naisha [W]
bonuses.description:
Naisha replaces Tyrande

Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Elune Glaives (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage, 6-12 targets
(30 second cooldown)

Elune Grace (Support Aura)
8-14% attack, move speed bonus

Elune Blessing (Self Spell)
500-2000 HP, 18-30% AS for 15 sec
(45 second cooldown)

Moonstorm (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 30-60% miss chance for 9-15 sec
(750 area of effect)
(60 second cooldown)

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Shadowmeld [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Powerful Blow
+1 level of Solid Boulders

Reduces spell damage to Archer, Druid, Huntress and Transmorph by 20%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Dryad Allies [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Critical Hit

Dryad replaces Archer
Ranged Unit
+10% attack rate
+4 damage
+75 HP
Abilities:
Abolish Magic (Disable Spell)
(dispels buffs from units)
Spell Resistance (Passive Skill)
(20% spell damage reduction)
Upgrades used:
Moon's Wrath
Moon Armor
Critical Hit
Slow Poison

Type: Anti Buff

bonuses.name: Elite Huntress [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Animal Synergy

Gives 30/50/70% chance that Huntress will dismount when her mount is killed. Unmounted Huntress has increased attack rate but reduced evasion. It can use Critical Hit upgrade.
(can be upgraded inside this building)

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Chimaera Allies [Z]
bonuses.description:

Chimaera replaces Hippogryph
Air Unit
+200 HP
Abilities:

(-6 armor and 18 dmg/s)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Acid Burn (Passive Skill)
(bonus damage to air units)

Moon's Wrath
Moon Armor
Critical Hit
Slow Poison
Animal Synergy

Type: Air Power / Strong Anti Air

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [X]
bonuses.description:
Icreases Tree of Life and Druid mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Tree of Life spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.name: Storage Stone
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Tree of Life mana reg

upgrades.name: Empowerment
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+12 Druid damage
-10% Druid spell cooldown
Rejuvenation +40 HP heal
Entangling Roots +1s duration
Lesser Starfall +50 damage

upgrades.name: Root Energizing
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+250 Building hit points
+50 building attack range

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Teldrassil, The World Tree [C]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Vengeance

By Elune, may the Teldrassil protect us from our enemies. The World Tree will be our key to getting the upper hand, it's influence, though small is present at the start. However, it needs some time before we could use the Tree's full powers to our advantage.

Type: Unique Bonus

spells.name: Teldrassil, The World Tree
spells.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Vengeance

Your ground units gain Vengeance: 8% that upon dying, a Wisp will spawn.
Every Wisp that dies will give +1 Mana to The World Tree.

Soiling the Ground (Tier 1)
Unlock Elder Owl Scout and your buildings have +30% dmg bonus.

Accumulating Life Force (Tier 2)
Unlock Ancient Owl Scout, your buildings have +45% dmg bonus and your main building has 20 HP/sec bonus regeneration.

The Tree Awakens (Tier 3)
Your buildings have +60% dmg bonus. Your main building has 50 HP/sec bonus regeneration. An Ancient will appear at all your barracks with every spawn.

Type: Unique Bonus

towerUpgrades.name: Powerful Blow
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate, chance to stun and dmg
Affects: Transmorph
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: +5% attack rate, 10% for 10 dmg, 0.8 sec
Lv2: +10% attack rate, 20% for 20 dmg, 1 sec
Lv3: +15% attack rate, 30% for 30 dmg, 1.2 sec
Lv4: +20% attack rate, 40% for 40 dmg, 1.4 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Bear Form
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage, hit points and armor
Affects: Transmorph

Lv1: +6 damage, +25 hit points and +2 armor
Lv2: +12 damage, +50 hit points and +4 armor
Lv3: +18 damage, +75 hit points and +6 armor
Lv4: +24 damage, +100 hit points and +8 armor

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Hit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Archer and Hippogryph Rider

Lv1: 10% to do 2.75x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 3x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 3.25x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 3.5x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Slow Poison
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Archer and Hippogryph Rider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 10 seconds
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 12 seconds
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 14 seconds
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 16 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Ricochet
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bouncing and damage
Affects: Huntress
(20% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: 1 bounce and +6 damage
Lv2: 2 bounce and +12 damage
Lv3: 3 bounce and +18 damage
Lv4: 4 bounce and +24 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Animal Synergy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate and evasion
Affects: Huntress and Hippogryph Rider

Lv1: +5% attack rate, +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% attack rate, +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% attack rate, +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% attack rate, +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Solid Boulders
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun on each attack
Affects: Ancient Defender and Ancient Protector
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 15% chance for 2.2 sec stun
Lv2: 25% chance for 2.4 sec stun
Lv3: 35% chance for 2.6 sec stun
Lv4: 45% chance for 2.8 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Force of Nature
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: summoning ability
Affects: Druid

Lv1: summons Lesser Treant for 20 sec
(has no abilities)
Lv2: summons Treant for 30 sec
(has 60% Spell Resist)
Lv3: summons Greater Treant for 40 sec
(has 20% block)
Lv4: summons Ancient Treant for 50 sec
(has Solid Boulders)

towerUpgrades.name: Vengeance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to spawn a Wisp
Affects: Your dying units

Lv1: 10% chance, has Healing Wave
heals 25/50/75/100 HP to 3 units
Lv2: 12% chance, has Mana Burn
burns 20/40/60 mana
Lv3: 14% chance, has Silence
silences for 10/20 seconds
Lv4: 16% chance, has Faerie Dust
+15% damage to 1 unit

t1spell.name: Entangle [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 200 damage in 170 AoF.
Stuns for 16 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Lightning Storm [X]
t2spell.description:
Calls down faling stars over your base.
Deals 300 damage every 3s for 18s.
(has 3s delay after activation)
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Fan of Knives (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage
(350-500 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Shadow Orb (Orb Effect)
18-30% lifesteal, 20 mana burn
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Warden's Grip (Disable mini Aura)
18-30% AS, 32-50% MS reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Spirit of Vengeance (Self Spell)
800-2000 HP, 10% AS bonus, +10% evasion, +30% spell resistance
(lasts 30s, has 90s cooldown)

skills.name: Fan of Knives - [Level 4]
skills.description: Hurls a flurry of knives, damaging nearby enemies. Each knife does 225 damage.

skills.name: Warden's Grip - [Level 4]
skills.description: Reduces attack rate by 18% and move speed by 32%.

skills.name: Spirit of Vengeance - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Transform into a powerful Avatar with 800 bonus hit points.
Lasts 30 seconds.

skills.name: Shadow Orb - [Level 4]
skills.description: Gain 24% of attack damage as hit points.

heroes.name: Priestess
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Rejuvenation (Healing Spell)
500-800 HP to 3-9 unit over 5s
(affects organic units only)
(30 second cooldown)

Burning Arrows (Orb Effect)
10-34 damage/sec to buildings

True Aim Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% ranged damage bonus

Starfall (Damage Spell)
30-60 damage/sec for 10s
(700 area of effect)
(100 second cooldown)

skills.name: Rejuvenation - [Level 1]
skills.description: Heals a target friendly unit for 500 hit points over 5 seconds.

skills.name: Burning Arrows - [Level 1]
skills.description: Causes buildings to take 10 damage/sec for 30 seconds.

skills.name: True Aim Aura - [Level 4]
skills.description: Increases damage of friendly ranged units by 13%.

skills.name: Dark Spirit - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Arakkoa Renegades for 30 seconds.

heroes.name: Archdruid
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun

summons 1-3 Treants for 30-60s

(900 area of effect)
(60 second cooldown)

skills.name: Impale - [Level 4]
skills.description: Shoots spiked tendrils out in a straight line, dealing 175 damage and hurling enemy ground units into the air in their wake, stunning them for 2.5 seconds.

skills.name: Force of Nature - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Trents for 30 seconds.

skills.name: Thorns Aura - [Level 4]
skills.description: An aura that gives friendly nearby units a damage shield, which deals 20 damage to melle attacker.

skills.name: Tranquility - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Causes rains of healing energy to pour down in a large area, healing friendly allied units for 60 hit points per second.
Lasts 10 seconds.
